origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EnergyPolicyAPI.analyze_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of energy policies on specified commodities.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyFocus', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical focus of the policy analysis, e.g., global, regional.'}, {'name': 'commodity', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The energy commodity to analyze the policy impact on, e.g., oil, natural_gas.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impactAnalysis', 'description': 'A report detailing how energy policies affect the specified commodity.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EnergyPolicyAPI.analyze_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyFocus'是'global', 'commodity'是'oil'.
